dist.hmm

Class SimpleHiddenMarkovModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • dist.hmm.ModularHiddenMarkovModel
      • dist.hmm.SimpleHiddenMarkovModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HiddenMarkovModel, java.io.Serializable, Copyable

    public class SimpleHiddenMarkovModel
extends ModularHiddenMarkovModel
    A hidden markov model implementation that does not use observations when calculating transition probabilities and has no notion of input / output In terms of this implementation it is a HiddenMarkoModel that uses SimpleTransitionDistributions for it's TransitionDistributions
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Guillory gtg008g@mail.gatech.edu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
